init

Class InitController

  • java.lang.Object
    • init.InitController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class InitController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Class controlling initial logging actions - having Model as a parameter for sending orders and InitView view to control.
    Since:
    2018-06-03
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wojciech Sitek
    See Also:
    ActionListener

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Controller cont
      Reference to main controller, used to pass further actions after this class functioning.
      private Model model
      Reference to model, handling SQL connection, enables checking type of user or registering new user.
      private InitView v
      View, initialised in constructor, showed as a visible window and handled by ActionListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InitController(Controller controller, Model mod)
      Class constructor, copying parameters and adding action listener to InitView.registerButton and InitView.logButton.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method actionPerformed - manages actions made by user in InitView - order to log in or to register.
      void startViewAgain()
      After signing out, this method enables Controller to make InitView visible again, to sign in again.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • cont

        private Controller cont
        Reference to main controller, used to pass further actions after this class functioning.

      • model

        private Model model
        Reference to model, handling SQL connection, enables checking type of user or registering new user.

      • v

        private InitView v
        View, initialised in constructor, showed as a visible window and handled by ActionListener

    • Constructor Detail

      • InitController

        public InitController(Controller controller,
                      Model mod)
        Class constructor, copying parameters and adding action listener to InitView.registerButton and InitView.logButton.
        Parameters:
        controller - Parameter passing reference to controller.
        mod - Parameter passing reference to model.

    • Method Detail

      • startViewAgain

        public void startViewAgain()
        After signing out, this method enables Controller to make InitView visible again, to sign in again.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Method actionPerformed - manages actions made by user in InitView - order to log in or to register.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        e - event, that has been performed - either from logButton (order to log in) or from registerButton (order to register)
